definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Middle rate is the arithmetic average rate of buying rate and selling rate, used for inter-bank.
sentences.chinese: 中間匯率是買入匯率和賣出匯率的算術平均數。

sentences.english: At the same time, short-term traders bought to reverse bets that stock prices would fall.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，短線交易員逆市買入，押注股價回升。

sentences.english: Ackman says investors can buy the Hong Kong Dollar 'outright.'
sentences.chinese: 阿克曼說，投資者可以“直接”買入港元。

sentences.english: Our buying rate for notes is 345 yen for 100 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 爵美元的現金買入價是三百四十五日元。

sentences.english: The two-day air refueling market will provide a relatively good buying opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 空中加油的兩天市場會提供相對好的買入機會。

sentences.english: The second approach will put you into exactly the most risky stocks on the list.
sentences.chinese: 第二點將會讓你買入名單上風險最大的那些股票。

sentences.english: It lets you buy a slice of America's future at a marked-down price.
sentences.chinese: 它讓你可以以市場低價買入美國的未來。

sentences.english: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger could turn to Olivier Dacourt as he seeks a replacement for Patrick Vieira.
sentences.chinese: 溫格可能會買入奧利佛達科特作爲維埃拉的替代者。

sentences.english: An instruction to a broker to buy or sell shares, stocks, commodities, currencies, etc; , as specified, at the best possible price.
sentences.chinese: 要求以當時可能的最優價位成交的買入或賣出指令。

sentences.english: Readers consume volumes of it, and then ask to meet the author.
sentences.chinese: 讀者成捲成帙買入這些作品，再求一見作者。

sentences.english: The Swiss hearing-aid maker was cut to “neutral” from “buy” at UBS AG.
sentences.chinese: 瑞銀集團把該公司股票評級從買入下調爲中性。

sentences.english: The difference between the bid and the offer price is the called the spread .
sentences.chinese: 區別買入和賣出價的，是所謂的蔓延。

sentences.english: That bullish close signals a new uptrend and long entry.
sentences.chinese: 看漲行情結束標誌一個新的上升趨勢和買入點的出現。

sentences.english: Netflix was raised to “buy” from “underperform” at Bank of America Corp.
sentences.chinese: 美國銀行把奈飛公司股票評級從減持上調爲買入。

sentences.english: Morgan Stanley (IIF) has issued a report recommending to buy shares of Spreadtrum Communications Inc (NASDAQ: SPRD).
sentences.chinese: 摩根斯坦利最近發表的一份報告中推薦買入展訊通訊。

sentences.english: If you like a stock or fund, buy on the dips.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡那隻股票或者基金，逢低買入。

definition: to sell/to reach (a price in an auction)
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to convert (an asset) into cash/to cash out
